hits.title: Ask HN: What are the best open source apps written with React/Redux?
hits.author: yadongwen
hits.story_text: I have gone through sound-redux (https://github.com/andrewngu/sound-redux) and the list in https://www.reddit.com/r/reactjs/comments/496db2/large_open_source_reactredux_projects/ but none has a fairly complex model layer. Are there new projects using redux-saga or backbone-redux?

hits.title: Ask HN: Reasons not to use Redux?
hits.author: horsecaptin
hits.story_text:
Hey everyone, I understand Redux and why to use it to store application state. I was wondering, are there reasons to not use Redux?

For example, since Redux is a monolothic store of application state, could the state tree get too big?

title.value: Ask HN: Reasons not to use Redux?

story_text.value:
Hey everyone, I understand Redux and why to use it to store application state. I was wondering, are there reasons to not use Redux?

For example, since Redux is a monolothic store of application state, could the state tree get too big?
